required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Perceived Barriers of Cervical Cancer Screening in Reunion Island and Key Levers for Improvment
clinical_study.official_title: Identification Des barrières au dépistage du Cancer du Col utérin à la Réunion et Des Leviers d'amélioration

lead_sponsor.agency: Centre Hospitalier Universitaire de la Réunion

clinical_study.source: Centre Hospitalier Universitaire de la Réunion

brief_summary.textblock: FOSFORE study aims at identifying the barriers of cervical cancer screening in Reunion Island and key levers for improvment.

detailed_description.textblock:
FOSFORE is a cross sectional KABP (Knowledge, Attitudes, Beliefs and Practices) telephone survey on cervical cancer screening from a sounding board of women aged between 25 and 65 years and living in Reunion Island.
Sample size was estimated from local datas on cervical cancer screening.

primary_outcome.measure: Type of barriers in cervical cancer screening
primary_outcome.description: Telephone survey with a KABP-like questionnaire

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of barriers in cervical cancer screening
primary_outcome.description: Telephone survey with a KABP-like questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: Type of levers in cervical cancer screening
secondary_outcome.description: Telephone survey with a KABP-like questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of levers in cervical cancer screening
secondary_outcome.description: Telephone survey with a KABP-like questionnaire

study_pop.textblock: Telephone survey from a sounding board of women living in Reunion Island

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Women aged between 25 and 65 yo
- living in Reunion Island
- speaking French, Creole or Shimaore language
- able to answer phone
Exclusion Criteria:
- history of hysterectomy
- history of incomplete or total conisation
